title: Echtzeit
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, International, Organic, Beer/Wine, Bakery, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Mostly bread (an organic bakery is integrated), pizza, pasta, soups and salads, lots of vegetarian and some vegan options are available in each section like vegan cheese (yeast sauce) on the pizza. Very modern and relaxed atmosphere.
